entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
